p.style: margin: 0px ; margin-top: 4px ; text-align: center ; text-decoration: underline

p.span: 1.1 Get the a star making a path - Done
1.2 Have raduis whering the monster starts attacking the player - Done
1.3 When in raduis raycast to the player and check if he is inline of sight
1.4 If in line of sight get path to player

div.p: 5. Get tile in direction of movement
6. Get Obsticals in direction of movement

p.style: margin: 0px ; margin-top: 4px ; text-align: center ; text-decoration: underline

div.p: 1. Parts of monsters become you, you are the weapon, eyes, heart, flesh, crystal.

p.span: 2. As the monster parts are absorbed into you, you become more corupt.
3. For now you have to walk into other enemies to damage them.

div.p: 1. Create a seperate path finding node and have it work out the walkable tiles once and then just send a vector2 of the next step to the monsters move method, so that the maps wlkable tiles only get set once

div.p: 1. On death the corpse creator listens for the type of monster
2. The corpse creator then instances the corpse and sends a message with the info (Corruption amount, Strengt, Weapon upgrade)
